response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Age", "medium", "At 21, his youth is associated with higher recidivism risk, though not definitively high."),
    ("Race/Ethnicity", "low", "Hispanic ethnicity is not by itself a strong predictor of recidivism risk."),
    ("Prior Arrest History", "medium", "A single arrest without conviction suggests some involvement but not a strong criminal history."),
    ("Marital Status", "medium", "Never having been married can relate to lower social stability which moderately affects risk."),
    ("Living Arrangement", "medium", "Living alone may indicate lower social support, slightly increasing risk."),
    ("Education", "medium", "Having only a high school diploma and not pursuing further education represents moderate risk in socioeconomic stabilization."),
    ("Employment Stability", "medium", "Holding two jobs in a year may indicate some employment instability, contributing moderately to risk."),
    ("Drug Use History", "low", "No drug use in recent years lowers risk considerably."),
    ("Mental Health", "low", "Not having felt depressed recently reduces risk from that perspective."),
    ("Childhood Environment", "medium", "Growing up in an urban setting with a single parental figure can contribute a moderate level of risk."),
    ("Religious Belief", "medium", "A belief system that minimizes spiritual guidance is associated with slightly less community support, moderately influencing risk.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

risk_factors: At 21, his youth is associated with higher recidivism risk, though not definitively high.
Hispanic ethnicity is not by itself a strong predictor of recidivism risk.
A single arrest without conviction suggests some involvement but not a strong criminal history.
Never having been married can relate to lower social stability which moderately affects risk.
Living alone may indicate lower social support, slightly increasing risk.
Having only a high school diploma and not pursuing further education represents moderate risk in socioeconomic stabilization.
Holding two jobs in a year may indicate some employment instability, contributing moderately to risk.
No drug use in recent years lowers risk considerably.
Not having felt depressed recently reduces risk from that perspective.
Growing up in an urban setting with a single parental figure can contribute a moderate level of risk.
A belief system that minimizes spiritual guidance is associated with slightly less community support, moderately influencing risk.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 11 inches and weighs 168 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological dad in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
